translations.en:
: ** :person_walking: On your way, you meet a traveling merchant. He says that he possesses some nice items that might interest you, for cheap.

:money_with_wings: Buy a cheap item.
:moneybag: Try your luck by buying one of his most expensive ones.
:x: Decline his offer.
:detective: Attempt to rob him.

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
